text: The Chairman () is a 1964 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksei Saltykov.ПРЕДСЕДАТЕЛЬ (1964) It stars Mikhail Ulyanov, Ivan Lapikov, and Nonna Mordyukova. ==Actors== *Mikhail Ulyanov as Yegor Trubnikov *Ivan Lapikov as Semyon Trubnikov *Nonna Mordyukova as Donya Trubnikova *Vyacheslav Nevinny as Pavel Markushev *Valentina Vladimirova as Polina Korshikova *Kira Golovko as Nadya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1964 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksei Saltykov
title: The Chairman (1964 movie)
